mapper.insert: INSERT INTO setting (username, startYmd, endYmd, activity, museum, cafe, tourAtt) VALUES (#{username}, #{startYmd}, #{startYmd}, #{endYmd}, #{museum}, #{cafe}, #{tourAtt}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE startYmd=#{startYmd}, endYmd=#{endYmd}, museum=#{museum}, cafe=#{cafe}, tourAtt=#{tourAtt}
